pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# MetaBootstrapMetaBootstrap is a library that fulfills the objective of making easier to make responses from Django Rest Frameworkto a client that uses Webix.
Read the documentation.
Author: ISN Studio.
Version: 1.1.0

Installation

If you want to install MetaBootstrap, you need to install it with pip.
pip install metabootstrap
If you also want to use MetaLog, you need to add it to yourinstalled apps.
INSTALLED_APPS = {    # Other installed apps    "metabootstrap.metalog"}
